#id=1
#text=I like taking a bath instead of a shower sometimes .
#id=2
#text=I start by closing the drain at the bottom of the tub .
#id=3
#text=Some tubs have a stopper and some have a thing you push down to close it .
#id=4
#text=After it 's closed I like to run both hot and cold water to make warm water and then I let the tub fill up to about a hand 's height from the top of the tub .
#id=5
#text=While the water is running , I squirt in bubbles and make sure I have a clean washcloth and towel .
#id=6
#text=After I carefully climb into the tub , I make sure I wash my whole body with the soap and washcloth , even behind my ears and between my toes .
#id=7
#text=Then I can either soak and relax in the tub or I can play with toys .
#id=8
#text=Fun toys for the bathtub are boats and plastic water animals like whales and ducks .
#id=9
#text=Once the water starts to turn a little cold , it 's time to get out so I open the drain again and let the water empty out .
#text=While it 's draining I carefully stand up and reach for my towel to dry off .
#text=I always be sure the tub is clean when I 'm finished , with toys and the dirty washcloth put where they belong .
